items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has been seeing a therapist.
It looks like Tom is getting tired of doing that.
If by any chance Tom needs help, please help him.

I've been trying to convince Tom to learn French.
I called Tom while I was walking to the bus stop.
Ask Tom to put the milk back in the refrigerator.
It's good to use small plates if you are dieting.
Mary is going to do whatever she can to help Tom.
Mary is depressed because her boyfriend left her.
Why am I always the one who has to do everything?
Do it yourself or hire somebody to do it for you.
At present, we have 1,600 students at our school.
My sister-in-law had four children in five years.
You do not necessarily have to go there yourself.
Seen from the sky, the island was very beautiful.
The rain was beating hard against the windowpane.
The addition of salt greatly improves the flavor.
I want to try that new restaurant on Park Street.
This isn't the first time Tom has made a mistake.
